data.enText: in a way that appears to be true but may in fact not be
according to what you have read or heard
Seemingly, he borrowed the money from the bank.
data.chText: 据说，他从银行贷出了那笔钱。

example: irrigation often produces bumper crops from apparently desert land
the child is seemingly healthy but the doctor is concerned
had been ostensibly frank as to his purpose while really concealing it"-Thomas Hard
on the face of it the problem seems minor

example.ex: A seemingly endless line of trucks waits in vain to load up.
example.tran: 一眼望不到头的一长列卡车眼巴巴地等着装货。

example.ex: ...bread made from a seemingly limitless variety of ingredients.
example.tran: 貌似用了无数种原料制成的面包

value.def: If something is seemingly the case, you mean that it appears to be the case, even though it may not really be so.
value.tran: 貌似，看似(但可能并非如此)

example.ex: He has moved to Spain, seemingly to enjoy a slower style of life...
example.tran: 他已经移居西班牙，似乎是想过一种更为悠闲的生活。

example.ex: He is a man with seemingly not an ounce of malice in him.
example.tran: 他这个人好像没有丁点儿的坏心眼。

gramarinfo.label: ADV with cl/group, ADV before v

value.def: You use seemingly when you want to say that something seems to be true.

partsOfSpeech.d: (强调真实无误)绝对地，完全地
紧密地；接近地；仔细地；严密地；精密地

partsOfSpeech.dec: con- 共同, 一起 + sequ 跟随 + -ent ...的 + -ly ...地
con- 共同, 一起 + vers  转 + -e + -ly ...地
exclusive adj.排除其他一切的 + -ly ...地
fortun(e) 运气 + -ate 具有...的 + -ly ...地
free adj.不受他人控制的 + -ly ...地
increas(e) 增加 + -ing 形容词后缀 + -ly ...地
read(y) 预备好了的状态 + -ly ...地

partsOfSpeech.d: (对自己的话很有把握，希望他人同意)想必

partsOfSpeech.dec: un- 否定 + like 像 + -ly ...地
in- 不,无 + variabl(e) 可变的 + -ly ...地

partsOfSpeech.d: (引出新话题、附加信息、或临时想到的问题)顺便提一句

partsOfSpeech.dec: literal adj.按字面常用意义理解的 + -ly ...地
